name: Vim no navio de Aruanda, Aruanda êêê
lyrics:
Vim no navio de Aruanda, Aruanda êêê
Vim no navio de Aruanda, Aruanda âââ
Porque me trouxeram de Aruanda
Pra que me trouxeram de Aruanda
Vim no navio de Aruanda, Aruanda êêê
    
Vim no navio de Aruanda, Aruanda êêê
Vim no navio de Aruanda, Aruanda âââ
Porque me trouxeram de Aruanda
Pra que me trouxeram de Aruanda
Vim no navio de Aruanda, Aruanda êêê
    
Mas eu vim no navio de Aruanda, Aruanda êêê
Vim no navio de Aruanda, Aruanda âââ
Porque me trouxeram de Aruanda
Olha deixe voltar pra Aruanda
Vim no navio de Aruanda, Aruanda êêê
    
coro
    
Mas eu vim no navio de Aruanda, Aruanda êêê
Vim no navio de Aruanda, Aruanda âââ
Porque me trouxeram de Aruanda
Pra que me trouxeram de Aruanda
Deixe voltar pra Aruanda, Aruanda êêê
    
coro

translations.text:
I came on Aruanda's ship, Aruanda eeê
I came on the ship of Aruanda, Aruanda -
Because they brought me from Aruanda
Why I was brought from Aruanda
I came on Aruanda's ship, Aruanda eeê

I came on Aruanda's ship, Aruanda eeê
I came on the ship of Aruanda, Aruanda -
Because they brought me from Aruanda
Why I was brought from Aruanda
I came on Aruanda's ship, Aruanda eeê

But I came on Aruanda's ship, Aruanda eeê
I came on the ship of Aruanda, Aruanda -
Because they brought me from Aruanda
Look let's go back to Aruanda
I came on Aruanda's ship, Aruanda eeê

choir

But I came on Aruanda's ship, Aruanda eeê
I came on the ship of Aruanda, Aruanda -
Because they brought me from Aruanda
Why I was brought from Aruanda
Leave it to Aruanda, Aruanda éêê

choir
